topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: OS distribution :: Live CD

name: VIMINAL
short_description: VIMINAL (VIrtual Model for Ip Network Architecture Lab) platform is an autonomous network and system lab environment. Available on a liveDVD / LiveUSB, it offers network models on which you have extended rights. It integrates all the materials needed to securely play system and IP network labs on common computers. The main goal is to play such labs, with no installation nor configuration modifications on your computer.
summary: VIrtual Model for Ip Network Architecture Lab
